verbose_text: Monitoring included (1) platelet count, (2) VerifyNow (Accumetrics, San Diego, California, United States), a standardized point-of-care device that assesses platelet reactivity to antiplatelet agents on whole blood with two different cartridges, one for aspirin and one for P2Y 12 receptor antagonists, XREF_BIBR (3) flow cytometric assay for platelet vasodilator associated stimulated phosphoprotein (VASP) phosphorylation to specifically monitor P2Y 12 receptor inhibition (Becton Dickinson, Le Pont-de-Claix, France), XREF_BIBR and (4) rotational thromboelastometry (ROTEM, Werfen, Barcelona, Spain) to assess the extrinsic pathway of coagulation (EXTEM test), especially the clotting time, defined as the time to clot initiation and the clot firmness.
